Experience the magic of 3 Nights 4 Days Karnataka Tour Package with our meticulously curated tour package, designed to showcase the best of this captivating island paradise. From cultural immersion to beachside relaxation, embark on a journey filled with unforgettable moments and lifelong memories.

Elevate Your Wonderful Experiences of 3 Nights 4 Days Karnataka Tour Package

Choose our 3 Nights 4 Days Karnataka Tour Package to explore the grandeur and charm of this incredible state.

Itinerary for Our 3 Nights 4 Days Karnataka Tour Package

DAY 1

Bangalore to Mysore

  • Arrival, pickup from Bengaluru & drive to Mysore.
  • Check-in at your hotel & freshen up.
  • Visit Mysore Palace: Mysore Palace used to be the official residence of the Wadiyar dynasty & the seat of the kingdom of Mysore.
  • Then visit Sri Chamundeshwari Temple: The temple dedicated to Chamundeswari, the fierce form of Shakti, a tutelary deity held in reverence for centuries by the Maharaja of Mysore.
  • Proceed to Mysore Zoo: Mysore Zoo safeguards many exotic wildlife species with a 123 years of history exhibiting wild animals in the near natural enclosures.
  • Explore the beautiful Brindavan Gardens, famous for its illuminated musical fountain show in the evening. Enjoy a leisurely stroll through the well-maintained gardens.
  • Overnight stay at a hotel in Mysore.

DAY 2

Mysore to Coorg

  • After breakfast, checkout & proceed to Coorg.
  • Namdroling Monastery (Golden Temple) in Bylakuppe. Spend some time exploring the monastery, admiring its intricate architecture, and witnessing the monks’ daily rituals.
  • Then visit Dubare Elephant Camp. Enjoy various activities like elephant bathing, feeding, and taking a jungle safari. Learn about the conservation efforts and the lifestyle of elephants.
  • Proceed to Chiklihole Reservoir. Spend some time relaxing by the reservoir, enjoying the serene surroundings, and taking photographs.
  • Check-in at a hotel in Coorg for an overnight stay.

DAY 3

Coorg Sightseeing

  • After breakfast, Visit Madikeri Fort and the museum inside, enjoy panoramic views of the town from the fort’s ramparts.
  • Then visit Raja’s seat. It is a scenic viewpoint that offers breathtaking panoramic views of the surrounding hills, valleys, and the distant Western Ghats.
  • Enjoy the scenic beauty of coffee plantations and explore the local markets.
  • Proceed to Omkareshwar Temple, a beautiful blend of Hindu and Islamic architectural styles. Take some time for prayer and meditation.
  • Explore Abbey Falls. Take a short hike through lush greenery to reach the falls. Spend some time enjoying the majestic waterfall and surrounding natural beauty.
  • Overnight stay at a hotel in Mysore.

DAY 6

Departure

  • Early morning, checkout from the hotel and drive to Kukke Subramanya Temple.
  • Visit the renowned Kukke Subramanya Temple and seek blessings.
  • Drive back to Bengaluru, marking the end of the trip.

Inclusions

  • Pickup & Drop.
  • Complete sightseeing by a Private AC Vehicle.
  • All Taxes, Tolls, Parkings & Driver Expenses.
  • Breakfast included.
  • Stay at 3/4/5 Star Hotels.

Exclusions

  • Any private expenses, room service charges.
  • Any entry charge to museums, forts or any other places of interest.
  • Anything that is not mentioned in the inclusions.

– For Issuance of the Flight Tickets, we require Full Payment of Airfare.
– Non- Refundable Services in the tour package have to be paid in full at the time of Booking.
– Payment Policy is non-negotiable and has to be paid accordingly.
